price: 84. Hij is het Die de enige god is in de hemel en de enige god is op de aarde. En Hij is de Alwijze, de Alwetende.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِلَٰهٞ وَفِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَٰهٞۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī fī al-samāi ilāhun wafī al-arḍi ilāhun wahuwa al-ḥakīmu al-ʿalīmu
